main event: A civilian man reported seeing a circular object with a blue-silver reflection, about 50 feet in diameter, at a speed of approximately 500 mph in Cincinnati, Ohio on July 25, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 20,000 feet., The object had a very brilliant appearance but lacked any dull glow., The sighting occurred around 11:05 A.M., Witness stated it was not a meteor or other known aircraft., Additional sightings were reported by the witness in subsequent weeks.
witness description: Civilian man, also accompanied by his wife and another witness who described a similar object.
